title.v: Cập nhật thông tin hóa đơn

action.text: declare @hash varchar(32), @c bit, @d bit, @k varchar(6) exec AI_ERP$System$CheckSum @@userID, @chkpass, 0, @c output select @c as val return

declare @c as int, @d smalldatetime, @q nvarchar(4000) select @d = @ngay_ct if (exists(select 1 from @@appDatabaseName..hddt01 where stt_rec1 = @stt_rec) or (@ma_ct = 'HD7')) select @c = 3 else select @c = case when @ma_ct in (&r;) then 1 else 2 end
if (@ma_ct = 'HD2' and @c <> 3) begin select @q = 'if exists (select 1 from @@appDatabaseName..m22$' + convert(varchar(6), @d, 112) + ' where stt_rec = ''' + replace(@stt_rec, '''', '''''') + ''' and stt_rec_hd = '''') select @c = 1 else select @c = 2' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@c int output', @c output end
select @c as r return
